Collection of scripts for simulation using montecarlo methods.

## Features

This repository uses [renv](https://rstudio.github.io/renv/index.html) for reproducible results and environment management. <img src="man/figures/renv-logo.svg" width="60" height="60" align="right"/>  
For activation use `renv::activate()` and `renv::restore()` to install dependencies of the repository.
